content: your bag out on a flat surface locate and place a st marker optional in the center side edge on both the right and left side with one marked st facing you count 12 sts to the right of the center and place a st marker in it then count exactly 23 sts from the st you just marked to the left and place a st marker in the 23rd st there will be 22 sts located between the two marked stitches you just placed these will be the stitches you will work into for your handle strap on each end repeat this process for the opposite center side edge then remove both of the optional center markers and continue on to the handle strap directions first side handle strap row 1 rs with colors d and e join yarn to first st to the left of your first st marker chain 1 single_crochet into the same st and remaining 21 sts to next marker 22 row 2 ws chain 1 turn skip the first st single_crochet 19 single_crochet remaining 2 sts together decrease made 20 row 3 chain 1 turn skip the first st single_crochet 17 single_crochet remaining 2 sts together 18 row 4 chain 1 turn skip the first st single_crochet 15 single_crochet remaining 2 sts together 16 row 5 chain 1 turn skip the first st single_crochet 13 single_crochet remaining 2 sts together 14 row 6 chain 1 turn skip the first st single_crochet 11 single_crochet remaining 2 sts together 12 row 7 -
